trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Edmonton
There were 2 other sightings in Edmonton on or around February 9th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Meandering, Hovering, Moving extermly fast, travelling in arcs
divs: Sighting DetailsThe ufo activity in the Edmonton area has increased dramatically in the last few weeks. I have been able to get glimpses of them every day and as a result I have ordered a high definition camcorder with night vision from the US and intend to capture these phenomenon on video. For practice, and because I am getting better at spotting them I took a regular camera outside at about 6 AM this morning to see if I could get one on camera. I did. It was difficult as they do not show up in the view finder and they travel extremely fast. So one just has to "shoot from the hip" so to speak. In the photo attached you can see the ufo to the far right, above the last blue star.
